title: src/pkg/syscall/zsyscall_freebsd_386.go must be rebuilt with proper list of files for mksyscall.sh (syscall_bsd.go is missing)
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. cd src
2. bash make.bash
3.

What do you see instead?

messages about missing utimes & futimes

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

GOOS=freebsd GOARCH=386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

afd6198fb082+ tip
